pageContext.claim: “If a Democrat had been elected, our country wouldn't be doing nearly as well...I can only tell you that we are doing well, like no one thought possible. I think these are like — you're talking about golden years, from an economic standpoint, from the economy, these are the golden years of our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inherited a thriving economy and it has continued on the same path, though at slightly slower pace than under Obama.  A president does not have such an immediate impact on an economy as large as the United States, though Trump's tax cut may have goosed it a bit. However, his trade wars may counteract the impact of the tax cut.
